name: My Friend is a Zombie
description:
This is my first ever game!

I joined this game jam in order to learn the basics of unity and boy did I learn a lot. It was a lot of fun even if my "game" was barely finished.

_______________________________________

Your friend has been turned into a zombie and is now out of control!

You must lead him to the hospital before it is too late.

Drag and drop the items at your disposal into the road in order to direct your friend.

Left click will remove items from the road.

Right click will rotate items on the road.
